constituent: come apart at the seams, thread, spiderman, determine, determined, house, mend
koohiiStory1: Even though his costume is coming apart at the seams as he chases the bad guys, Spiderman is still determined to catch them.
koohiiStory2: Spiderman´s costume has come apart at the seams and here he is, mending it in his house, determined to make it stronger than before.
words: 綻びる(ほころびる): to come apart at the seams, to begin to open, to smile broadly
